argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b p q

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | qusgrp.h | |- H = ( G /s ( G ~QG S ) ) |
| 2 |  | qusadd.v | |- V = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | qusadd.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | qusadd.a | |- .+b = ( +g ` H ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) -> H = ( G /s ( G ~QG S ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) -> V = ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_nsgsubg | |- ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) -> S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( G ~QG S ) = ( G ~QG S ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_eqger | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( G ~QG S ) Er V ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) -> ( G ~QG S ) Er V ) |
| 11 |  | #P_subgrcl | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 12 | 7, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 13 | 2, 8, 3 | #P_eqgcpbl | |- ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) -> ( ( a ( G ~QG S ) p /\ b ( G ~QG S ) q ) -> ( a .+ b ) ( G ~QG S ) ( p .+ q ) ) ) |
| 14 | 2, 3 | #P_grpcl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ p e. V /\ q e. V ) -> ( p .+ q ) e. V ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( p e. V /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( p .+ q ) e. V ) |
| 16 | 12, 15 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) /\ ( p e. V /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( p .+ q ) e. V ) |
| 17 | 5, 6, 10, 12, 13, 16, 3, 4 | #P_qusaddval | |- ( ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( [ X ] ( G ~QG S ) .+b [ Y ] ( G ~QG S ) ) = [ ( X .+ Y ) ] ( G ~QG S ) ) |
